Name: Beat Back
Description: Deal 2 damage. If you have three or more cards in hand, also deal 2 damage to another enemy.

Name: Submerge
Description:
Recover 3 vitality.
Blank a card until tomorrow.

Name: Dabble
Description:
Recover 4 vitality.
Deal 3 damage.
Remove 2 ‚è≥.

Name: Outlast
Description: Deal 6 damage. If damage is dealt to an enemy this way that is in excess of the amount of health it had remaining, also deal X damage to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field, where X is the amount of excess damage dealt.
